general_info.summary: This text outlines information related to applying for a course, potential career paths in engineering, and various university-related updates and resources. It includes details about recruiters, COVID-19 updates, specific Sharda University campuses in Uzbekistan and Agra, courses on ethics, a national cyber crime portal, and an international credit transfer program.
